uientry.s:
local this = UIComponent(Address) local slider = UIComponent(this:Find("vslider")) local close_button = UIComponent(this:Find("button_close"))
close_button:SetProperty("ParentPopup", Address) slider:SetProperty("Notify", Address)
function OnDropped() return true end
function Notify(from, value) this:InterfaceFunction("SetLuminosity", value) end
function PickColour(clicked_x, clicked_y) this:InterfaceFunction("PickColour", clicked_x, clicked_y) end

local this = UIComponent(Address) local colour_wheel = UIComponent(this:Parent("colour_wheel")) local picking = false
function OnMouseLClickUp(clicked_x, clicked_y) picking = false end
function OnMouseLClickDown(clicked_x, clicked_y) if colour_wheel:IsMouseOverChildren() then colour_wheel:LuaCall("PickColour", clicked_x, clicked_y) picking = true end end
function OnMouseMove(clicked_x, clicked_y) if picking == true then colour_wheel:LuaCall("PickColour", clicked_x, clicked_y) end end
